mapper.select: SELECT RESERVATION_DATE MEMBER_NO FROM VISIT_RESERVATION WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND RESERVATION_STATUS_NO = 1

SELECT VISIT_NO ,MEMBER_NO ,RESERVATION_STATUS_NO ,RESERVATION_DATE ,SUMMIT_DATE ,MODIFY_DATE ,DEL_YN FROM VISIT_RESERVATION WHERE DEL_YN = 'N' AND RESERVATION_STATUS_NO = '1' AND TRUNC(RESERVATION_DATE) = TRUNC(TO_DATE(#{reservationDate}, 'YY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS')) ORDER BY RESERVATION_DATE ASC

SELECT V.VISIT_NO ,V.MEMBER_NO ,V.RESERVATION_STATUS_NO ,V.RESERVATION_DATE ,V.SUMMIT_DATE ,V.MODIFY_DATE ,V.DEL_YN ,S.RESERVATION_STATUS FROM VISIT_RESERVATION V JOIN RESERVATION_STATUS S ON S.RESERVATION_STATUS_NO = V.RESERVATION_STATUS_NO

SELECT V.VISIT_NO ,V.MEMBER_NO ,V.RESERVATION_STATUS_NO ,V.RESERVATION_DATE ,V.SUMMIT_DATE ,V.MODIFY_DATE ,V.DEL_YN ,S.RESERVATION_STATUS FROM VISIT_RESERVATION V JOIN RESERVATION_STATUS S ON S.RESERVATION_STATUS_NO = V.RESERVATION_STATUS_NO WHERE V.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND V.DEL_YN = 'N' AND S.RESERVATION_STATUS = '예약 중' ORDER BY V.VISIT_NO
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO VISIT_RESERVATION ( VISIT_NO ,MEMBER_NO ,RESERVATION_STATUS_NO ,RESERVATION_DATE ) VALUES ( SEQ_VISIT_RESERVATION_NO.NEXTVAL ,#{memberNo} ,'1' ,TO_DATE(#{reservationDate},'YY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') )
mapper.update: UPDATE VISIT_RESERVATION SET RESERVATION_DATE = #{reservationDate} ,MODIFY_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND DEL_YN = 'N'
UPDATE VISIT_RESERVATION SET RESERVATION_STATUS_NO = 3 ,MODIFY_DATE = SYSDATE ,DEL_YN = 'Y' WHERE VISIT_NO = #{memberNo}
UPDATE VISIT_RESERVATION SET ,RESERVATION_STAYUS_NO = 2 MODIFY_DATE = SYSDATE DEL_YN = 'Y' WHERE VISIT_NO = #{reportNo}
